title: The Orb - The BBC Sessions 1989-2001 (2008) [mp3@320]
description:
Label: Universal Island Records
Format: 2 x CD, Album, Compilation
Country: UK
Released: 23 Sep 2008
Genre: Electronic 
Style: Dub, Downtempo, Experimental, Ambient
Audio: MP3 CBR 320 Stereo
Playtime: 77:59 min + 63:28 min

The back sleeve has some incorrect info, the correct info is taken from the booklet. 

1-1: John Peel Session 03.12.89. Sample Credits: 'Loving You', 'Slave To The Rhythm', 'Shine On You Crazy Little Diamond' 
1-2, 1-3: John Peel Session 02.10.90. 1-2 AKA Back Side Of The Moon (Tranquility Lunar Orbit). 1-3 AKA Into The Fourth Dimension 

(Essences In Starlight]. 
1-4, 1-5: John Peel Session 12.05.92 
1-6 to 1-8: Evening Session 01.03.01 
2-1 to 2-3: Mark Radcliffe 12.07.95 
2-4: Lamacq Live 14.02.95. Note: 'Valley' is omitted from this recording. 
2-5 to 2-9: Lamacq Live 12.10.98
